decision_conditions: In absence of existing floorplans, elevational drawings, and photographs of the internal of the building, it has not been demonstrated, on the balance of probability, that the development would comply with Schedule 2, Part 1, Class E of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended) .

It has not been demonstrated that the proposed outbuilding would be incidental to the enjoyment of the  house and, therefore  does not fall within the parameters of Class E of Part 1 of Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development ) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
Insufficient evidence has been provided to demonstrate that the outbuilding has been in situ for a period in excess of 4 years and as such would be immune from Enforcement action.

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: LGW Name: London Gatwick Safeguarding Zone (200m)
SMKCON Name: Borough Wide Smoke Control Order

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All applications for developments likely to attract birds or connected with an aviation use.Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

description: Erection of rear outbuilding garden room for family use and storage on the footprint of the original garage.
